0.9.8.name: wordpress/pagely-multiedit
0.9.8.description:
One thing I always wished WP would do better is allow for multiple editable content blocks on page templates. This plugin uses custom fields to create simple tinyMCE editable regions on page templates.

See Instructions and Usage Examples here: Page.ly MultiEdit plugin

NOTE: Must be used inside/after the opening loop statement: while (have_posts()) : the_post(); multieditDisplay('YourBlockName');

Brought to you by: Page.ly WordPress Hosting

Follow @strebel and feel free to check out Page.ly
